evidence.text:
Person B: Sir, please! My husband’s inside!
Person B: My husband’s inside… He thought he heard voices crying for help.
Person B: And he went into the house trying to save whomever was trapped by the fire.
Person B: Okay… No, I don’t know…
Person A: I’m sorry. There was nothing we could do.
Person A: He didn’t get to the second floor, he must have passed out from the smoke and the flames.
Person B: And the other bodies?
Person B: But he… he told me that he heard screams for help…
Person B: It’s true. I didn’t hear the screams either. I tried to stop
